channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- Boot Camp
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- Boot Camp

item.title: CVE-2021-30675|2024-08-03T22:40:31.987Z -- apple -- boot%20camp
item.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue is fixed in Boot Camp 6.1.14. A malicious application may be able to elevate privileges.
